name: BattMoLiIonBatteryDataModel
description: A description of the parameters needed by BattMo to instantiate a Li-ion battery cell model.

properties.name: initT
properties.description: Initial temperature of the battery cell

properties.name: use_thermal
properties.description: indicates if a thermal model is used.

properties.name: include_current_collectors
properties.description: indicates if current collectors are considered in the model

properties.name: use_solid_diffusion
properties.description: indicates if a solid diffusion model is used

properties.name: control
properties.description: contorl parameters for the BattMo simulation

properties.name: negative_electrode
properties.description: model parameters for the negative electrode

properties.name: positive_electrode
properties.description: model parameters for the positive electrode
